body.name: Gospire Ultra-Slim Lighted Travel Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification, Rechargeable 3X Magnifying Mirror with 3 Light Colors & Adjustable Brightness, LED Compact Mirror for Purses - Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 34 mins
features: 【1X & 3X Magnification】Magnifing mirror are available in 1X and 3X magnification, 1X is suitable for daily use or dressing, hair styling, etc., and 3X is suitable for makeup, skin care, shaving, etc. in details.

【Rechargeable & Portable】With its powerful battery, this travel mirror can be effortlessly used on-the-go for several weeks on a single charge, thanks to its Ultra-slim size and lightweight design that allows for easy carrying in bags, purses, and pockets whether at home or during travel.

【3 Light Colors & Stepless Dimming】Lighted mirror offers 3 different light colors to match any environment - White, Natural and Warm. With stepless dimming, you can easily adjust the brightness to achieve your desired lighting level.

【Flexible-angle Lock】Featuring a dampened hinge at the pivot point, it securely holds the pocket mirror at any desired angle, allowing you to effortlessly use it with just one hand. No more need for finger support or an extra hand to stabilize the mirror. Moreover, its stable placement ensures a steady surface experience.

【Independent Brightness】Each light color of makeup mirror has an independent brightness setting, allowing you to customize your preferred brightness level for each light color that will remain unchanged regardless of switching or turning off the light.

【Perfect Gift】The compact mirror for women is a fantastic beauty gift idea, if you give it to your sister, wife, girlfriend and mother as a gift on anniversary, birthday, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day and Christmas, they will be very happy.

【Satisfaction Guaranteed】We offer an 12-month warranty and a 60-day warranty refund guarantee. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply and provide you with perfect solutions within 12 hours. Thanks for your support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Illuminating Reflection of Excellence!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the GoSpire LED Pocket Mirror, and it has truly exceeded my expectations. The sleek design coupled with the bright LED lights make this mirror an absolute game-changer for on-the-go beauty needs. The LED lights provide the perfect illumination for precise makeup application, ensuring every detail is flawless. The pocket-sized design is incredibly convenient, making it a must-have in my handbag. The build quality is impressive, and the mirror feels sturdy and durable. I appreciate the thoughtful touch of adjustable brightness, allowing me to customize the lighting based on different environments. The battery life is excellent, providing long-lasting usage without frequent replacements. The GoSpireCare or GoSpire brand has truly nailed it with this LED pocket mirror – it's a fantastic blend of functionality and style. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, portable mirror with exceptional lighting. Five stars without a doubt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice magnifying mirror, small and compact, three light choices, great price. Plus, rechargable with USB cable to charger or computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional compact mirror
reviews.reviewText: This little thing is perfect for travel or to keep in your purse. There are 3 different light settings. The led button is touch activated. The light doesn’t automatically turn off if you close the mirror but that isn’t a deal breaker. I like that it’s slim and compact. I do wish there was a darker color because the white and pink are likely to get visibly dirty - but of course they can be easily cleaned. I can’t speak on the battery life yet but it is very easy to charge. Excited to keep using this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for purse or travel
reviews.reviewText: Works for me as a travel mirror. Different tones of light, charges via USB, thin & easy to put in a makeup bag or purse. If that’s what you need, this is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wife Approved for Travel!
reviews.reviewText: I picked this up for my wife. She’s used this for many weeks and she’s been very happy with it. She likes the lightweight of the mirror and has really enjoyed the built-in light..especially when doing makeup touch ups inside of the car. She likes the ability to utilize the different light temperatures and brightness levels. She also has appreciated how well the battery has held up. I don’t think we’ve had to recharge it since we charged it the first time! Based on my wife’s experience I’d say this is great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a pretty pink color, and thinner than I thought out would be. Very bright light!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it so much bought 6 more to give as gifts
reviews.reviewText: I loved it so much that I bought 6 more to give as Christmas gifts. While it is perfect while on the go, it is also perfect for at home to get all those pesky chin hairs with the magnification regardless of room lighting. Very slim and lightweight. Charge lasts a long time, comes with USB charging cord. Love the 3 different lighting options, make sure to turn it off before closing though. Absolutely worth the $9.99.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is perfect. Love the lighted mirror. It is made to change from really bright to medium light for different makeup effects. Perfect size for traveling and every day use
